EmailTemplate.subject: Security of LegalZoom.com
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued LegalZoom Customer,
Thank you for your recent inquiry. In regards to your question, LegalZoom.com is a highly secure website that is tested and certified daily to pass the HACKER SAFE Security Scan. Furthermore, when entering your information on the online questionnaire, LegalZoom.com uses a VeriSign SSL Certificate to encrypt your data transmission, and thus securing your private information. LegalZoom.com is also recognized as meeting all Better Business Bureau Online Reliability standards and is confirmed as a Better Business Bureau member. Moreover, when completing the online questionnaire, you are not required to provide any social security numbers or account numbers.
Please call us toll-free at (800) 962-7490 if we can be of further assistance.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team {!snippetVariable.lz_address}
